name: Untitled Cartoon Network Game Jam Game
name_original: Untitled Cartoon Network Game Jam Game
description:
In February 2016 our team participated in a Game Jam with Cartoon Network. Our goal was to make a game based on a single character in the new show O.K. K.O. Let's Be Heroes. Our character was Rex Th' Bunny.

He's a bounty hunter from another planet...

[TODO: ADD MORE TEXT WHEN YOU FEEL MORE CREATIVE]

Our Team:

Nate Lewis - Programming
Jared Hafer - Programming
Jason Norman - Art
Adam Pierce - Programming/Design
Sam Waldo - Music
